column5: I have a matched pair of sidelocks for a double barreled black powder shotgun, antique. And a trigger guard as well. Not military, but hunting. Where is the best place to go for an estimate of the value and the best palce to sell them?

I don't know about your area, but if you posted it for sale on some hunting forums, you'd prolly get a bite..........  I can give  you a few numbers for my area, but not sure that will help you much?  Sinker
